DOC.criteria: Subject must endoscopically confirm erosive esophagitis define Los Angeles ( LA ) Classification Grading System ( AD ) within 14 day prior baseline . Episodes heartburn regurgitation experience last 7 day prior baseline . Coexisting disease affect esophagus ( eg , eosinophilic esophagitis , esophageal varix , scleroderma , viral fungal infection , esophageal stricture ) , history radiation therapy cryotherapy esophagus , caustic physiochemical trauma sclerotherapy esophagus . Presence Schatzki 's ring ( ring mucosal tissue near low esophageal sphincter ) Barrett 's esophagus exclusionary . Current history ZollingerEllison syndrome acid hypersecretory condition , current gastric duodenal ulcer . Known hypersensitivity PPI ( include lansoprazole , omeprazole , rabeprazole , pantoprazole esomeprazole ) , component ilaprazole , Gelusil . Cancer ( except basal cell carcinoma skin ) within 5 year prior screen .
